data.eml:eml: On the rotifer fauna of Disko Island, Greenland, with notes on selected species from a stagnant freshwater lake

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sørensen, Martin Vinther (2006): On the rotifer fauna of Disko Island, Greenland, with notes on selected species from a stagnant freshwater lake. Zootaxa 1241: 37-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273458
